description: My place is at the heart of the East Village - lively streets and amazing availability of restaurants, shops and nightlife. It is however cozy and very quiet, being on the 6th floor (note though: no elevator) and facing away from the street. 3 minutes walk from the L-train stop to the west side and to Brooklyn, and up to 10 minutes walk to stops on the 4, 5, 6, N, R, and F trains. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Cute 1-bedroom in the East Village
review: Everything went smooth.  Place is in a great location.  The only con was the 6 floor walk up.
